summary: This bill, the Nulhegan River and Paul Stream Wild and Scenic River Study Act of 2025, proposes an amendment to the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act. It designates the Nulhegan River and Paul Stream in Vermont for potential inclusion in the national wild and scenic rivers system, mandating a study by the Secretary of the Interior within three years. The study will assess the suitability of these river segments for such designation and report findings to Congress.
